explanation: [0-0] A man is squatting on a brown and white checkered floor with a white wall behind him. He has two pink braids, wears colorful sunglasses, a dark blue shirt, and a light green suit with a light green tie. In front of him is a large pink slime crystal mud, which he is slapping with his right hand while smiling.

[0-5] Immediately, the man jumps up and kneels in the slime crystal mud, with only his head visible above the slime. The scene then switches to a man standing in front of a beige wall, wearing a dark blue top with white stripes on the sleeves and gray pants. He is bouncing a ball on his head, the ball rapidly going back and forth between his head and the wall. Next, the man with the pink braids starts imitating this action, wearing a dark blue top, black pants, and black shoes. He throws a basketball hard at the wall with both hands; the ball bounces back and hits him in the face, causing him to fall backward. The ball then rapidly bounces back and forth between his face and the wall.

[5-9] The scene then changes to a black and green background. A green snake opens its mouth, revealing two sharp fangs. The mouth keeps opening wider and spits out a man's head. The man opens his mouth and spits out a smaller man's head, who then opens his mouth and spits out an even smaller man's head. This last man opens his mouth and sticks out an arm, index finger pointing forward. All three men are wearing yellow-green sunglasses and have black beards, while the latter two men have pink hair.

[9-13] The scene then switches to a dark brown wooden floor. On the floor is a white piece of paper. A blue-green toy turtle with a light purple shell is holding a pen, spinning it in circles on the paper and drawing a flower-shaped pattern. The scene then changes to the man with the pink braids lying on his stomach on a light brown wooden floor. He is holding colorful pens in both hands, spinning them in circles on the white paper, eventually drawing a picture with many orange flowers on a yellow background. The man smiles and raises his index finger towards the camera.
